|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM47081A0;BCM47081A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68C16CWQD-25H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C0:C1:C0 |oui = C0:C1:C0
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = yes,, 14-pad header,,

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/28/2012 |estreldate = 04/30/2013 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883597420 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00C0WZ9FW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4352;BCM4352KMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217;BCM43217TKMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N:141â€¦" and "REV:0A1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The ''[[Arcadyan]]'' project listed on the FCC label is WG9116FAC22-88 (10/24/2012) :The serial number on the FCC label is '''01C10C1C007544''' :The MAC on the FCC label is '''C0C1C03C5F73''' ([http://hwaddress.com/?q=C0:C1:C0 Cisco-Linksys, LLC]) It would seem the default SSID pattern for this device will be '''LinksysXXXXX'''
This device seems to use a ''[[Broadcom]]'' BCM47081A0KFEBG processor. :This device obviously includes a GbE Switch (+ PHYs) and, [http://www.anandtech.com/show/5925/broadcom-announces-bcm4708x-and-bcm5301x-socs-for-80211ac-routers per AnandTech], :possesses two ARM Cortex A9 cores and includes USB 3.0 support.
There appears to be a small Serial Flash on the top of the board :and a larger NAND Flash on the bottom.
{{WiFiCert|WFA18036|01/22/2013}}
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://home.cisco.com/en-us/press/releases/release_linksys_01072013 ''Announced in this press release''] (01/07/2013) :[http://www.engadget.com/2013/01/07/linksys-reveals-a-trio-of-802-11ac-wifi-routers-with-beamforming/ PR via '''Engadget'''] *[http://ces.cnet.com/8301-34439_1-57562440/cisco-adds-three-more-routers-to-its-802.11ac-portfolio/ ''Cisco adds three more routers to its 802.11ac portfolio'' on '''C|NET'''] :One USB 3.0 port *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-features/32089-a-nice-surprise-for-early-linksys-ea6300-buyers ''A Nice Surprise For Early Linksys EA6300 Buyers'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :It appears early EA6300 units (EA6300V1) are actually [[Linksys EA6400]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
